translations: n．衬线：指字体中字母或符号的笔画末端的小横线或装饰。衬线字体（如Times New Roman）在印刷品中常用，因为它们易于阅读。
· Serifs can make a font look more elegant and professional.
衬线可以使字体看起来更加优雅和专业。

sentences.sentence: Then cut some serifs, and... not ready yet!
sentences.translation: 切除不要的衬线，然后就…等等，还没完！

sentences.sentence: A typeface in which characters have no serifs.
sentences.translation: 一种字符没有衬线的字体。

sentences.sentence: Alphabets without serifs are called sans serif.
sentences.translation: 不带这种衬线的字母称作无衬线字母。
